uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation

Class PlainPureSeparation

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation.BasicPureSeparation
      • uniol.apt.analysis.synthesize.separation.PlainPureSeparation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Separation

    class PlainPureSeparation
extends BasicPureSeparation
implements Separation
    This class finds impure solutions to separation problems without any other properties.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlainPureSeparation

        protected PlainPureSeparation(RegionUtility utility,
                              java.lang.String[] locationMap)
        Construct a new instance for solving separation problems. This constructor does not do any checks for supported properties. It is the caller's responsibility to check this.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        locationMap - Mapping that describes the location of each event.

      • PlainPureSeparation

        public PlainPureSeparation(RegionUtility utility,
                           PNProperties properties,
                           java.lang.String[] locationMap)
                    throws UnsupportedPNPropertiesException
        Construct a new instance for solving separation problems.
        Parameters:
        utility - The region utility to use.
        properties - Properties that the calculated region should satisfy.
        locationMap - Mapping that describes the location of each event.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedPNPropertiesException - If the requested properties are not supported.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareInequalitySystem

        protected InequalitySystem prepareInequalitySystem()
        Prepare an inequality system for use by this class. The resulting system will only calculate plain regions.
        Overrides:
        prepareInequalitySystem in class BasicPureSeparation
        Returns:
        A new inequality system.
